Package org.ginsim.core.graph.view.style

Interface StyleProvider<V,​E extends Edge<V>>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - the vertex
    E - the edge
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConnectivityStyleProvider, GraphComparatorStyleProvider, InteractionAnalysisStyleProvider, LocalGraphStyleProvider, LRGCustomStyleProvider, LRGPatternStyleProvider, LRGStateStyleProvider, PathStyleProvider, STGPathStyleProvider
    public interface StyleProvider<V,​E extends Edge<V>>
    Define a style provider: it provides styles for nodes and edges and can be applied to a StyleManager to temporarily override the graph styles.
    Author:
    Aurelien Naldi

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default String getCSS()  
      EdgeStyle<V,​E> getEdgeStyle​(E edge, EdgeStyle<V,​E> baseStyle)
      Get the style used for an edge.
      default Map<Object,​Color> getMColorsMap()  
      NodeStyle<V> getNodeStyle​(V node, NodeStyle<V> baseStyle)
      Get the style to use for a node.

    • Method Detail

      • getNodeStyle

        NodeStyle<V> getNodeStyle​(V node,
                          NodeStyle<V> baseStyle)
        Get the style to use for a node.
        Parameters:
        node - the node
        baseStyle - the style to use as fallback
        Returns:
        the style to use or null to use the graph's style
